data.text:
The Career Path of Alumni over the past 5 Years

Japanese Companies That Have Hired GS Graduates

NISSAN MOTOR CO., LTD, The Kansai Electric Power Company, LIXIL Corporation, ORIX Corporation, Rakuten Group, Inc., JCB Co., Ltd., Mitsubishi Electric Corporation, DESCENTE LTD., Nitto Denko Corporation, SoftBank Corp., CyberAgent, Inc., Nippon Telegraph and Telephone West Corporation, Faurecia Clarion Electronics Co., Ltd., Sharp Corporation, ROHM Co., Ltd., Nippon Telegraph and Telephone East Corporation, KDDI Corporation, Accenture Japan Ltd.

Graduate Schools

Overseas: University of Oxford, Stanford University, London School of Economics and Political Science, George Washington University, University of Manchester, The University of Sydney, The Chinese University of Hong Kong, University of San Diego, Leiden University, The University of Sheffield, Seoul National University, University of Bristol, Université Libre de Bruxelles, American University

Japan: Ritsumeikan University, Tokyo University, Kyoto University, Nagoya University, Osaka University, Kobe University, Tsukuba University, Keio University, Hitotsubashi University, Waseda University

Government and International Organization

Ministry of Foreign Affairs, Japan International Cooperation Agency (JICA), The Japan Foundation, Cabinet Office, Ministry of Internal Affairs and Communications, Ministry of Economy, Trade, and Industry, Ministry of Finances, Ministry of Defense, Acquisition, Technology, & Logistics Agency, Japan Coast Guard, National Tax Agency (Senior Specialist), Ministry of Justice Hiroshima Immigration Bureau, International Economy & Work Research Institute

Trading Companies

ITOCHU Corporation, Sumitomo Corporation, MITSUI & CO., LTD., Sojitz Corporation, Marubeni Corporation, Mitsubishi Corporation, TOYOTA TSUSHO CORPORATION

Manufacturer

Automobile

TOYOTA MOTOR CORPORATION, NISSAN MOTOR CO., LTD, HONDA MOTOR CO. LTD., SUZUKI MOTOR CORPORATION, MITSUBISHI MOTORS CORPORATION, HINO MOTORS, LTD., ISUZU MOTORS LIMITED

Electric / Electronics Devices

Panasonic Corporation, MITSUBISHI ELECTRIC Corporation, NEC Corporation, Fujitsu Limited, OMRON Corporation, ROHM Co., Ltd., KYOCERA Corporation, KEYENCE CORPORATION, NIIDEC Cooperation, Murata Manufacturing Co., Ltd., SCREEN Holdings Co., Ltd., AISIN CORPORATION, ISHIDA CO. LTD., SHIMADZU CORPORATION, HORIBA, Ltd., GS Yuasa Corporation.

Merchandise/ Food/ Pharmaceutical

The Procter & Gamble Company, Unilever Japan K.K., Kirin Holdings Company, Limited., Sapporo Breweries Limited., SUNTORY HOLDINGS LIMITED, Japan Tobacco Inc., House Foods Group Inc., LOTTE Co., Ltd., MORINAGA & CO., LTD., Ezaki Glico Co., Ltd., Asahi Group Holdings, Ltd., NIPPN CORPORATION, Yamazaki Baking Co., Ltd., Shionogi & Co., Ltd., Kobayashi Pharmaceutical Co., Ltd.,ROHTO Pharmaceutical Co., Ltd.,Otsuka Pharmaceutical Co., Ltd.,NIHON L'ORÉAL K.K.

Others

Mitsubishi Heavy Industries, Ltd, DAIKIN INDUSTRIES, Ltd., IHI Corporation,KUBOTA Corporation, TORAY INDUSTRIES, INC., TOYOBO CO. LTD., LIXIL Corporation, The Japan Steel Works, Ltd., CANON INC., ASICS Corporation, Hitachi Zosen Corporation, Sharp Corporation.

Information Technology

NTT DOCOMO, INC., SoftBank Group Corp., NTT East, NTT West, NTT Communications, Amazon.com, Inc., Microsoft Japan Co., Ltd., IBM Japan Digital Services Company, Rakuten Group, Inc., Oracle Corporation Japan, Yahoo Japan Corporation, LINE Corporation, CyberAgent, Inc.

Infrastructure

Japan Airlines Co., Ltd., All Nippon Airways Co., Ltd., Skymark Airlines Inc., Singapore Airlines, Emirates, Central Japan Railway Company, West Japan Railway Company, Hokkaido Railway Company, Hokkaido Electric Power Company Incorporated, Chubu Electric Power Co., Inc., The Chugoku Electric Power Company, Incorporated, JAPAN POST Co., Ltd., YAMATO TRANSPORT CO., LTD., SAGAWA EXPRESS CO., LTD., NIPPON EXPRESS CO., LTD., DHL Supply Chain, Nippon Yusen Kabushiki Kaisha, Yusen Logistics Co., Ltd.

Media

Bloomberg L.P., Avex Inc., CyberAgent Inc., K.K. Kyodo News, FM OSAKA Co., Ltd., Kyoto Shimbun Co.,Ltd., Kyoto Broadcasting System Co.,Ltd., RCC BROADCASTING CO.,Ltd., Chunichi Shimbun CO.,Ltd., Shizuoka Telecasting CO.,Ltd., TV TOKYO Holdings Corporation, Tokai Television Broadcasting CO.,Ltd., TOYO KEIZAI INC., Nishinippon Broadcasting CO.,Ltd., Japan Broadcasting Corporation., The Mainichi Newspapers CO.,Ltd., The Yomiuri Shimbun.
